io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base

Class SplittingSampler<S extends Sampler<I>,I,O extends Collection<I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.base.CachingBasedSampler<O>
      • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base.TransformationBasedSampler<S,I,O>
        • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base.SplittingSampler<S,I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - type input sampler
    I - type of input sample
    O - type of transformed sample returned
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CachingSampler<O>, CanCache, Sampler<O>, TransformingSampler<S,I,O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StringToListSampler

    public abstract class SplittingSampler<S extends Sampler<I>,I,O extends Collection<I>>
extends TransformationBasedSampler<S,I,O>
    Abstract Sampler to split single Sample into multiple objects. For example, splitting a String into multiple lines or words.
    Since:
    3.0.0
